name: Same Colors Repel, Opposite Colors Attract

value.text: Same Colors Repel, Opposite Colors Attract

galleryCharacter.key: Same Colors Repel, Opposite Colors Attract

imgDesc.text:
Objects with
red or
blue Unipolar Fields are a common sight throughout Nod-Krai. Unipolar Fields of the
same color repel each other, while those of
different colors attract.
